name: AzureDevTestLabsDeleteVM
description: Delete the given Azure DevTest Labs VM
helpMarkDown: Deletes the specified virtual machine from the selected lab.
author: Microsoft Corporation
releaseNotes: Works with cross-platform agents (Linux, macOS, or Windows)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Resource Manager subscription to configure before running.

inputs.name: LabId
inputs.label: Lab
inputs.helpMarkDown: Lab from which the resource will be deleted. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a subscription. Selecting a name from the list will extract the corresponding Lab ID. The Lab ID is a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}`. Variables in the form `$(varName)` are allowed.

inputs.name: LabVmId
inputs.label: Virtual Machine
inputs.helpMarkDown: Virtual Machine that will be deleted. This is a pick list generated as a result of selecting a lab. Selecting a name from the list will extract the corresponding Virtual Machine ID. The Virtual Machine ID is a value in the form `/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{rgName}/providers/Microsoft.DevTestLab/labs/{labName}/virtualMachines/{vmName}`. Variables in the form `$(varName)` are allowed.
